Content: My favorite block is the Light Grey Concrete blocks.
But I'm strong with Light Grey Concrete.
There's one thing I hate in this world.
And it's videos that explain why Minecraft: "died".
They dissed any new thing Minecraft has added after 1.8.10.
Or because they're sad about Minecraft not being fun or active to them anymore.
I mean_ Optimus (The creator of 'The Day that Minecraft Died') don't seem like the kind of guy to want attention.
He seems like some guy who is nostalgic.
Like every person of the planet/
Who apparently knows what's good for Minecraft.
You know how Terraria added new caves and other underground stuff in 1.3? That'll be 1.15.
...This guy is running this conversation up the asphalt.
With spam saying how Minecraft is "repetitive".
Can't wait to see this little guy in 1.14.
Ever since Mo' Creatures made foxes in Minecraft first.
I'm just dying to see foxes.
What's wrong with you and change_ <@!251808367368994816> ?
I'm concrete when it comes to playing games like Minecraft.
In Minecraft and outside of my game.
You expect the MC Staff to be no shows?
Or in the extreme hills_ or-
...Or you could dig straight down and live in a dungeon.
You strike me as...The impatient type.
And the type who plays modded 1.8.10 and barely anything else.
It's a pretty stormy day today.
The clouds are darkening_ the air is freezing...
On days like this_ people like you...
<@558757599311298721> Nah_ I wanna cover you in concrete powder to suffocate you.
Because good lord_ where did your parents go wrong?
Sometimes I'd wish the Minecraft staff could just face-palm in unison right now to some of these nostalgic players of Minecraft saying that the game is getting worse.
Minecraft getting a sequel would mean people would have to pay for an update for Minecraft.
This game don't need a new engine/
As the saying goes_ "If it ain't broke don't fix it."

The reason why players like you get tuned out by the Minecraft staff is because you guys can't seem to want anything except getting doped up with some sparkly_ blender thrown_ haphazardly thrown in additions.
You know_ people play tested new additions in Minecraft to see if they're fit to be in the final game.
The reason why things like new biomes and such aren't just getting thrown out there_ is because they actually care about not overinflating the game with so may things_ that it becomes out of control.
Yes!NLIt's IN Minecraft_ you cement head!
Minecraft is on a downward trend on Google Trends_ so Minecraft is dead.
Do better research if you're just going to go make a bold claim like Minecraft being dead.
Since I bought Minecraft only a mere few months ago.
And bough pocket edition years ago.
So I locked it on normal.
Unfortunately_ the cave spiders got me.
Look at this boy tryin' to criticize Jeb and anyone involved with updating Minecraft. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8OxvsE2W1HQ
His own nostalgia got the best of 'em.
A concrete feature_ if you will.
I don't got Discord's App 'cause I heard it takes your data.
Whatever paves your road_ I suppose.
I'd be honored to join your game.
How many times have I said concrete?
Nothing like a good ol' buildin'!
Don't judge me_ he was in the way of my statue!
I don't know why everyone's givin' me funny looks.
WHAT THE FAKK IS THIS?! "FAKKING SPONGE CAKE?!" "WHAT THE FAKK?!"
That name reminds me of someone.
That bug where you get stuck in a wall after enterin' a bed is something I associate with Tobsuscus's playthrough of Minecraft. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rw9air9SIy0
For accidentally killing a small villager?
It's illegal if there's a law against it.
There's no law that prevents me from chugging concrete.
But there is one against distributing the game.
The game constantly tells you not to distribute it.
I want to make concrete pancakes.

For some reason. when I was searchin' up concrete pancakes_ this came up. https://m.facebook.com/hbdessertcafe/videos/no-pancakes-nor-waffles-again-today-just-freshly-poured-concrete-pipe-work-and-a/1391966084235778/
I highly recommend disliking the videos.
Read the description of this darn video. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3P0aYng6Wik It's just such a hoot!
Updates I don't like and refuse to accept? Looks like Microsoft's killing another game franchise like they did with Banjo Kazooie!
I can play the game 36 fps no problem.

I hate when people keep saying Microsoft bought the game and started releasing "pointless updates" immediately glancing over the fact the dev team for Minecraft EVEN THE ONES WHO MAKE THE UPDATES FROM THE QUOTE UNQUOTE GOLDEN AGE OF MINECRAFT are still making what you call: "pointless updates" that make the game "complex" and "mundane" and "watered down and commercialized to the point that the game dies".
Microsoft ain't doing nothin' to this game.
Minecraft was my childhood.... "...it got new updates_ but it was just BLAND to me..." "...Minecraft has changed so much..."
I like the nifty graphics they added to the game.
Minecraft looks even more pretty now.
The texture update is like a new beginning...
And so today_ I know that it's a new start.
I can see all the bad times are disappearing...
Minecraft's the one that makes me feel so high!
Because it's my diamond in the sky!
I never want to hear myself say goodbye!
'cause Minecraft's my diamond in the sky!
It's the one that makes me feel so high!
'cause it's my diamond in the sky!
I never want to hear myself say goodbye.
If you're wonderin'_ this is the song I'm trying to sing. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=toJs8Ulj51s
*looks away from the oncoming disaster and whistles my stage music idly*
The community mods on Discord are nuts.
Then why the foilage are you here?
This IS a Minecraft server_ ain't it?
You gotta have Minecraft one way or another.
*pours a bucket of water_ solidifying the concrete covering Coinflip*
Hope he likes cold hard concrete.
And can break a lot of things.
Be right back_ I'm going to make a giant green pipe out of concrete.
<:observer:425391425727889408> Me when someone says concrete is the worst thing that's ever happened to Minecraft.
I'm gonna need a bigger reaction image to this one
For your information_ I'm artificial intelligence!
